feedback: Why is my mobile data so slow in Auckland? I'm paying for 5G but barely getting 3G speeds!
response: We're sorry you're experiencing slow speeds! Can you please DM us your location details and account info so we can check for network issues in your area?

feedback: I've been on hold for over an hour trying to get support. This is unacceptable!
response: We apologize for the long wait time. Our team is experiencing higher-than-usual call volumes. You can also reach us via live chat or DM for faster assistance.

feedback: Why do you keep increasing prices without improving service? This is a rip-off!
response: We understand price changes can be frustrating. Our recent adjustments help us invest in better network coverage and faster speeds. Let us know if you'd like to review your plan options.

feedback: My broadband keeps disconnecting randomly. Fix this ASAP!
response: That sounds frustrating! Please restart your modem and check for any service outages in your area. If the issue persists, DM us with your account details so we can investigate.

feedback: I switched to One NZ for better coverage, but I barely get a signal in my house!
response: We're sorry to hear that! Can you share your location via DM? We’ll check coverage and see if a solution like WiFi Calling or a signal booster might help.

feedback: Your customer service is useless! No one ever helps with real issues.
response: We’re sorry you feel this way. Can you let us know the issue you’re facing? We’d love to help resolve it.

feedback: I paid my bill, but my account still says overdue. What’s going on?
response: That shouldn’t be happening! Payments can take some time to process. DM us your details so we can check your account and sort this out.

feedback: Why is your roaming so expensive? $8 a day is too much!
response: We understand cost concerns. Our roaming plans offer unlimited calls, texts, and data in many countries. If you’d like alternatives, we can help find the best option for you.

feedback: Your website is so slow and crashes when I try to pay my bill. Fix it!
response: Thanks for flagging this! Can you try clearing your browser cache or using another device? If the issue continues, let us know so we can investigate.

feedback: I ordered a new SIM a week ago and still haven’t received it. What’s the delay?
response: Sorry for the wait! Shipping can take longer during busy periods. DM us your order number, and we’ll check on your delivery status.

feedback: Your broadband speeds are a joke. Paying for 900Mbps and getting 50Mbps. Why?
response: That’s not the experience we want for you. Can you run a speed test and DM us the results? We’ll check if there’s an issue with your connection.

feedback: Why do you charge a $5 fee just to speak to a customer service agent? Ridiculous!
response: We offer multiple free support options like live chat and our app. The fee helps us prioritize self-service options, but we’re happy to assist however we can.

feedback: Network outages again? Why is One NZ always down?
response: We know outages are frustrating. Can you check our service status page for updates? If your area isn’t listed, DM us so we can look into it.

feedback: Your app is terrible! Half the time, I can’t even log in.
response: That’s not ideal! Have you tried updating the app or reinstalling it? If the issue continues, let us know your device details so we can assist.

feedback: I canceled my plan last month, but you still charged me. Refund me now!
response: Sorry for the inconvenience! Some charges may apply for the final billing cycle. DM us your details, and we’ll review your account to resolve this.

feedback: Why is there no unlimited data option? Every other provider has one!
response: We offer high-data plans with great value. While we don’t have unlimited data yet, we’re always looking at ways to improve our plans. Let us know what works best for you!

feedback: 5G coverage is supposed to be nationwide, but I barely get a signal in my area. What’s up?
response: 5G coverage is expanding, but some areas may still have limited connectivity. Can you share your location via DM? We’ll check what’s available for you.

feedback: Why do you throttle speeds after reaching the data cap? It’s unfair!
response: We slow speeds after the cap to ensure fair usage for all customers. If you need more data, we have add-ons available—let us know if you'd like details.

feedback: Your customer service reps keep giving me different answers! Which one is right?
response: We apologize for any confusion. Let us know the issue, and we’ll get you a clear and accurate answer.

feedback: I regret switching to One NZ. Can I just cancel and go back to my old provider?
response: We’re sorry you feel that way. If there’s something we can do to improve your experience, let us know. We’d love to help!
